title: 40-minute NO REPEAT Full Body Strength Training with Dumbbells
description:
Build a strong body with this fun and effective no-repeat strength workout! This workout is packed with compound and isolation exercises with a focus on building strength and definition! We will work through 7 rounds each round consisting of 4 exercises to target all of the major muscle groups! You will only need dumbbells and an exercise mat for this workout!

Sign up for Bike & Bells Thrive here! https://kaleighcohen.com/bikeandbellsthrive/

40-MINUTE FULL BODY NO-REPEAT WORKOUT STRUCTURE AND EXERCISES
EQUIPMENT NEEDED
- DUMBBELLS- I used a range from 10lbs to 30lbs / 4.5- 13.6kg When selecting a weight for this workout, you want to lift moderately heavy!
- EXERCISE MAT

STRUCTURE
7 ROUNDS
4 EXERCISES PER ROUND
WORK: 60 SECONDS REST: 20 SECONDS
REST BETWEEN ROUNDS: 30 SECONDS

EXERCISE LIST
- UNILATERAL KICKSTAND SQUAT
- SWITCH SIDES
- GOBLET SQUAT
- SUMO SQUAT HOLD 
- KICKSTAND ROMANIAN DEADLIFT
- SWITCH SIDES
- SUMO ROMANIAN DEADLIFT
- CALF RAISES
- ARMS UP ROW
- SCAPULAR RETRACTORS
- UNILATERAL HOLD AND CURL
- SWITCH SIDES
- CHEST PRESS SLOW LOWER
- KNEELING CHEST FLYS
- SNOW ANGEL
- TRICEP OVERHEAD EXTENSION
- REAR LUNGE TO HAMMER CURL AND PRESS
- SWITCH SIDES
- GLUTE BRIDGE TO PULLOVER
- RENEGADE ROW
- ALTERNATING SNATCH
- KNEELING FRONT RAISE
- UNILATERAL DEAD BUG WITH DUMBBELL
- SWITCH SIDES
- HIPS UP REVERSE GRIP CHEST PRESS
- KETTLEBELL SWINGS
- CRUNCH CLAPS
- FEET DOWN TWIST

I am so glad you joined me for this workout! It's always better to workout with a friend!

Kaleigh

Don't forget to stretch! 👉 https://youtu.be/IjH_8pdybfs

channelDescription:
Hello! I'm Kaleigh and I create CYCLE & STRENGTH training programs to challenge and transform you into an unstoppable force!

I'm here to help you BUILD CONFIDENCE THROUGH STRENGTH!

I am a certified Spin instructor, Stages Beats instructor, NASM certified personal trainer, and Girls Gone Strong Pre/ Postnatal coaching certified with over 13 years of experience coaching all over the world!

comments: This was a fun one! Loved seeing both Stella and Nacho🎉 my dog slept through it, too 😂😂

I LOVE this workout! Thank you for making a 40-minute, no-repeat, sweat-it-out routine. You keep it fun and entertaining with your quirky style and smart coaching. Happy New Year! Please keep doing more!

What a great workout! My husband and I have recently started training 3-4 times a week with your videos and we're loving them 😍 We appreciate the work you put in to crafting these routines, along with your sense of humour and of course your super chilled dogs. Thank you so much 💗💗💗

I am 3 months post partum and I have been trying to find motivation to get back into exercising for a mountain of reasons... I bought an exercise bike and THEN found your videos and I just want you to know your work outs are a TOTAL GAME CHANGER. You have such a joyful, funny, can-do attitude and it is contagious and it makes people WANT to come back. I didn't even bother looking for any other videos because you are IT. I can't tell you what a difference it has made to find your channel! Loved this Day 2 work out and I can't wait to come back for more tomorrow! Thank you, Kaleigh!!!

I’ve only recently found your channel and the workouts are great, not too complicated and definitely helping me get back in shape after being out of action for over a year. Love the stretching ones too.
